mapper.select: select seq ,mem_id ,mem_name ,board_subject ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from board_study order by seq DESC
select seq ,mem_id ,mem_name ,board_subject ,DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(board_content, 1000, 1) AS board_content ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from board_study where seq = #{seqInt}

select seq ,mem_id ,mem_name ,board_subject ,DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(board_content, 1000, 1) AS board_content ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from board_study where
mem_name like '%'||#{schText}||'%'
board_subject like '%'||#{schText}||'%'
board_subject||board_content like '%'||#{schText}||'%'
select seq ,mem_id ,mem_name ,board_subject ,DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(board_content, 1000, 1) AS board_content from board_study where seq = #{seqInt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_study ( seq , mem_id , mem_name , board_subject , board_content , reg_date , upt_date , view_cnt ) VALUES ( (select NVL(max(seq + 1), 0) from board_study), #{id}, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0 )
